intro: The v-tabs component is used for hiding content behind a selectable item. This can also be used as a pseudo-navigation for a page, where the tabs are links and the tab-items are the content.

alignTitle.heading: Align with title
alignTitle.intro: Make v-tabs lined up with the v-toolbar-title component using the align-with-title prop (v-app-bar-nav-icon or v-btn must be used in v-toolbar).

center.heading: Center active
center.intro: The center-active prop will make the active tab always centered

customIcon.heading: Custom icons
customIcon.intro: prev-icon and next-icon can be used for applying custom pagination icons.

icontext.heading: Icons and text
icontext.intro: Using icons-with-text prop increases the v-tabs height to 72px to allow for both icons as well as text to be used.

right.heading: Right
right.intro: The right prop aligns the tabs to the right.

vertical.heading: Vertical Tabs
vertical.intro: The vertical prop allows for v-tab components to stack vertically.
